conditions.name: SameRankOrSuit
conditions.description: You can play a card with the same rank or the same suit as the card above.

conditions.name: RankAscendingOrDescending
conditions.description: You can play a card that is one rank higher or lower than the card above.

conditions.name: OddRank
conditions.description: You can only play cards with odd ranks.

conditions.name: EvenRank
conditions.description: You can only play cards with even ranks.

conditions.name: SameColor
conditions.description: You can only play cards of the same color (red or black).

conditions.name: PrimeRank
conditions.description: You can only play cards with prime-numbered ranks (2, 3, 5, or 7).

conditions.name: FaceCardsOnly
conditions.description: You can only play face cards (Jack, Queen, King).

conditions.name: LowerOrHigherByTwo
conditions.description: You must play a card that is exactly two ranks higher or lower than the card above.

conditions.name: NoRepeatSuit
conditions.description: You cannot play a card if its suit has been played before.

conditions.name: OnlyAces
conditions.description: You can only play aces.

conditions.name: OnlyClubs
conditions.description: You can only play Clubs.

conditions.name: OnlyDiamonds
conditions.description: You can only play Diamonds.

conditions.name: OnlyHearts
conditions.description: You can only play Hearts.

conditions.name: OnlySpades
conditions.description: You can only play Spades.

conditions.name: MultipleOfThreeRank
conditions.description: You can only play cards with ranks that are multiples of 3 (3, 6, or 9).

conditions.name: MustBeLower
conditions.description: You can only play a card with a lower rank than the card above.

conditions.name: MustBeHigher
conditions.description: You can only play a card with a higher rank than the card above.

conditions.name: SumToTen
conditions.description: The rank of the played card and the card above must sum to 10.

conditions.name: Fibonacci
conditions.description: You can only play cards with ranks that exist in the Fibonacci sequence (Ace, 2, 3, 5, 8).

conditions.name: Wildcard
conditions.description: For your next play, you can play any card.

conditions.name: Wildcard
conditions.description: For your next two plays, you can play any card.

conditions.name: Wildcard
conditions.description: For your next three plays, you can play any card.

conditions.name: Wildcard
conditions.description: For your next four plays, you can play any card.
